channel.title: *Sigh*
channel.description:
I used to play videogames like crazy. I'd play for so long my hands would start to hurt and cramp up. It would usually take me a day to beat any game because I had no life. But now, I've been playing them less and less, which is weirding me out because I love them.
I guess they're not as fun as they used to be. I'm still gonna play Guitar Hero, which is pretty much the best game I've ever bought.

item.title: *Sigh*
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Same here. My life was based on video games from age 4-11. Now for the past 3-4 years, I just play some halo if friends come over. Or I’ll play Guitar Hero once a week.

Read full topic

item.title: *Sigh*
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

I played on a GTA SA server the other day for 20 hours straight… trust me i slept like a baby after that.

Read full topic
